DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy long-term treatment entacapone patient Parkinson 's disease end-of-dose wearing-off . This study recruit patient United States .
DOC.brief_title: An Extension Study Entacapone Patients With Parkinson 's Disease With End-of-dose Wearing-off . This Study Not Recruiting United States
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study evaluate safety efficacy long-term treatment entacapone patient Parkinson 's disease end-of-dose wearing-off .
DOC.criteria: Attended Phase IIb study Able fill patient diary Serious heart , pulmonary , renal , hepatic gastrointestinal disease Dementia symptoms Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
